name: tasker
description: Tasker plugin tool: exposes tasker_cmd for /task tool-dispatch

binary.description: tasker binary name or absolute path (default: tasker)

rootPath.description: Store root path passed as --root to tasker (default: ~/.tasker)

timeoutMs.description: Max runtime for tasker CLI invocations

allowWrite.description: If false, block mutating subcommands (add/edit/done/mv/note add/etc.)
